title: OpenACR
description: Open Accessibility Conformance Report (OpenACR) as a YAML file.

title.description: The title of the report in the heading format of '[Company Name] Accessibility Conformance Report'.

description.description: A brief description of the product.

report_date.description: Report date. If none is provided today's date is used as default in any output.

notes.description: Any details or explanation about the product or the report.

evaluation_methods_used.description: Include a description of evaluation methods used to complete the OpenACR for the product under test.

legal_disclaimer.description: Area for any legal disclaimer text required by your organization.

license.description: You should specify a license for your OpenACR so that people know how they are permitted to use it, and any restrictions you're placing on it. Must be a valid SPDX license see https://spdx.org/licenses/. If none is provided 'CC-BY-4.0' is assumed default in any output.

repository.description: Specify the place where your OpenACR lives. This is helpful for people who want to contribute.

feedback.description: The url to your project's issue tracker to which issues should be reported. These are helpful for people who encounter issues with your OpenACR.

related_openacrs.description: Link to related OpenACRs. E.g. CKEditor is a library used by Drupal and both have OpenACRs.

type.description: Specify whether the link is a primary or secondary.

success_criteria_level_a.description: Success criteria level A. Table/chapter 1 in all versions.

notes.description: Any details or explanation about the chapter.

success_criteria_level_aa.description: Success criteria level AA. Table/chapter 2 in all versions.

notes.description: Any details or explanation about the chapter.

success_criteria_level_aaa.description: Success criteria level AAA. Table/chapter 3 in all versions.

notes.description: Any details or explanation about the chapter.

hardware.description: Hardware (chapter 4 in 508/WCAG/INT versions, chapter 8 in EU version).

notes.description: Any details or explanation about the chapter.

name.description: Name of component. E.g. Web, Electronic Docs, Authoring Tools, Software, and so on.
